font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 n. 户口普查： an official survey of the population of a country that is carried out in order to find out how many people live there and to obtain details of such things as people's ages and jobs
【近】 tale, tally

【记】 censor + us 对我们大家的审查就是大众化，普通化的审查了，叫人口普查；sense us 感觉一下我们大众，看看有多少人
